events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized this customer complaint under the refund cluster due to mention of refund request.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product delivered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate the help resolving this issue promptly.
The refund request has been fulfilled and a confirmation email sent. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and to ensure everything has been resolved satisfactorily.
As we have not heard otherwise, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
